parameters.name: CalType
parameters.description: The old or new version of the security score rule. If you set this parameter to **home_security_score**, the new version of the security score rule is returned. Otherwise, the old version of the security score rule is returned by default.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.
